bill.title: Harrison County Motor Vehicle for Hire Commission; revise memebership and eliminate oversight by Harrison County.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 936, Local And Private Laws Of 2010, As Amended By Chapter 959, Local And Private Laws Of 2012, As Amended By Chapter 901, Local And Private Laws Of 2013, To Revise The Membership Of The Harrison County Motor Vehicle For Hire Commission; To Eliminate Responsibilities For Oversight Of The Commission By Harrison County; To Clarify The Powers And Duties Of The Commission; To Provide For Appeals From Certain Decisions Of The Commission; To Provide That Violations Of Rules And Regulations Established By The Commission Shall Be Misdemeanors; And For Related Purposes.
